channel.title: Does Anybody now the code for making mods and admins?
channel.description:
I need help for the code to make admins and mods with out the files....its possible please help
~thankx

item.title: Does Anybody now the code for making mods and admins?
item.dc:creator: @invalid_name1 invalid name
item.description:
@invalid_name1 wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“admin”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOURCHARACTERNAME”")) {
String name = command.substring(6);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.sendMessage(“YOURCHARACTERNAME” just made you admin !!!");
}

if(command.startsWith(“mod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOURCHARACTERNAME”")) {
String name = command.substring(4);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.sendMessage(“YOURCHARACTERNAME” just made you mod !!!");
}

if(command.startsWith(“undo”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOURCHARACTERNAME”)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.sendMessage(“WHAT EVER MESSAGE YOU WANT HERE !”);
}[/code]

I think thats what hes looking for?

Read full topic
item.source: Does Anybody now the code for making mods and admins?
